timeline.message:
avoid unused imports

fixes https://github.com/eclipse/xtext-xtend/issues/1029

Signed-off-by: Harald Fassler <harald.fassler+9974@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Nitpick: Please use the correct year and your copyright.
timeline.author: szarnekow

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.testdata/src/bar/String.java b/org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.testdata/src/bar/String.java
index fd75c9109..bce04e905 100644
--- a/org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.testdata/src/bar/String.java
+++ b/org.eclipse.xtext.xbase.testdata/src/bar/String.java

@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 /*******************************************************************************
- * Copyright (c) 2011 itemis AG (http://www.itemis.eu) and others.
+ * Copyright (c) 2020 Harald Fassler and others.
  * This program and the accompanying materials are made available under the
  * terms of the Eclipse Public License 2.0 which is available at
  * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0.

timeline.bodyText: It's really unfortunate that this is not a pre-commit hook: Please update the copyright year in the files you touch.
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText:
Should I add the year ("2011, 2020") or replace 2011 by 2020 entirely?
Also in xtext-xtend I found other files, where there are already two years in the header. When there is already written "2014, 2016" for example, should I make "2014, 2016, 2020", "2014-2020" or just "2020"?
Thank you for your help!
replies.author: nineninesevenfour
